title: Transp&Supply Chain Sys
description: Topics include supply chain characterization, site location, mode selection, distribution planning, vehicle routing, demand management, replenishment management, geographic information systems, and real-time control issues. Credit will not be awarded for both ISYE 6203 and ISYE 6383.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:

prerequisites: ISYE 6669 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
